Description: A large hoop-shaped bangle: of calcite with slightly convex inner face and strongly convex profile.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: F. Ll. Griffith, 'Liverpool Annals of Archaeology and Anthropology 8 (Liverpool, 1921), 75, decribes calcite armlets without particular reference to this object.
Bibliographic references: Andrews 1981 / Catalogue of Egyptian Antiquities. Jewellery I (363)
